S06sspp2_3u:0: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇām etad abhūt:
S06sspp2_3u:2: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:3_0: māyopamā me devaputrā dharmadeśanā māyopamā me devaputrā dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:3_1: nirmitopamā me devaputrā dharmadeśanā nirmitopamā me devaputrā dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:3_2: te naiva kiṃcic chroṣyanti na sākṣātkariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:4: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocan:
S06sspp2_3u:5: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikā,
S06sspp2_3u:6: nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikāḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:9: māyopamās te sattvā māyopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikā,
S06sspp2_3u:10: nirmitopamās te sattvā nirmitopamās te dhārmaśravaṇikāḥ. svapnopamās te devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:119: atha te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocan:
S06sspp2_3u:120: bodhir api subhūte svapnopamā māyopamā vadasi. tat kiṃ nirvāṇam api svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadasi?
S06sspp2_3u:122: nirvāṇam apy ahaṃ devaputrāḥ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadāmi,
S06sspp2_3u:123: sacet tato nirvāṇād anyaḥ kaścid dharmo viśiṣṭataro bhavet,
S06sspp2_3u:124: tam apy ahaṃ svapnopamaṃ māyopamaṃ vadeyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:125: tathā hi devaputrāḥ svapnaś ca māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_3u:130: āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśyapo 'nekāni ca bodhisattvasahasrāṇy āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim evam āhuḥ:
S06sspp2_3u:131: ke 'syā bhadanta subhūte gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃdurdṛśāyā evaṃduranubodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃpraṇītāyāḥ pratyeṣitāro bhavanti?
S06sspp2_3u:132: athāyuṣmāṃ subhūtis tān mahāśrāvakān tāñ ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:133_0: avaivartikā āyuṣmanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyā evaṃgambhīrāyā evamatarkāyā evamatarkāvacarāyā
S06sspp2_3u:133_1: evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃdurdṛśāyā evaṃduranubodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā evaṃpraṇītāyā
S06sspp2_3u:133_3: dṛṣṭasatyā vā pudgalā arhanto vā kṣīṇāsravāḥ paripūrṇasaṃkalpāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāś
S06sspp2_3u:133_4: ca sattvā bahubuddhakoṭīṣv avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītāś ca kulaputrā

S06sspp2_3u:1664_0: anena devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇāsyā gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃgambhīrāyā evamatarkāyā
S06sspp2_3u:1664_1: evamatarkāvacarāyā evaṃsūkṣmāyā evaṃnipuṇāyā evaṃdurdṛśyāyā evaṃduravabodhāyā evaṃśāntāyā
S06sspp2_3u:1665: evamalamāryāyā evaṃpaṇḍitavijñavedanīyāyā na kecit pratyeṣitāro bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:1666: tathā hy atra na kaścid dharmaḥ sūcyate na paridīpyate. yathaivātra na kaścid dharmaḥ sūcyate na paridīpyate tathaivātra na kaścit sattvaḥ pratyeṣitā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_3u:1667: atha āyuṣmān śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:1668: na tv āyuṣman subhūte iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa trīṇi yānāni vyavasthāpyante. śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhayānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:1669: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigraha upadiśyate. prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate,
S06sspp2_3u:1717_0: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānām abhijñāvikrīḍitāny upadiśyante. evaṃkila bodhisattvā
S06sspp2_3u:1717_1: mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti. evam abhijñāsv aparihāṇadharmāṇo bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:1719_0: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti. tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ
S06sspp2_3u:1719_1: pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni samṛdhyanti. yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām
S06sspp2_3u:1721: yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti. sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:1731: evam etad āyuṣman śāradvatīputra evam etat,
S06sspp2_3u:1732_0: tathā yathā vadasi vistareṇeha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāny upadiṣṭāni śrāvakayānaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:1732_1: pratyekabuddhayānaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ saṃparigraha upadiṣṭaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:1733: prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad daśamaś cittotpādo bodhisattvamārgaś copadiśyate,
S06sspp2_3u:1782: upadiśyante. evaṃkila bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti. evam abhijñāsv aparihāṇadharmāṇo bhavanti,
S06sspp2_3u:1784: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti. tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tānīmāni tathārūpāṇi kuśalamūlāni samṛdhyante,
S06sspp2_3u:1785: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:1787: yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti. sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptā samāhitayogena. asaṅgapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,

S06sspp2_3u:2250: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākānkṣiṣyanti. tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi (ŚsP_II-3_44)

S06sspp2_3u:3079_1: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upapādukā bhaviṣyanti. evam abhijñāṃ ca parihāṇadharmāṇo bhavanti,
S06sspp2_3u:3081: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣiṣyanti. tān buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni tathārūpāṇi (ŚsP_II-3_56)
S06sspp2_3u:3083: yañ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:3085: yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti. sadāsamāhitāś ca bhaviṣyanty avikṣiptāś ca samāhitayogena. asaṅgapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:3086: anārthavatpratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti. samāhitapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:3090: sarvalokābhyudgataviśiṣṭapratibhānāś ca bhaviṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:3093: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūt:
S06sspp2_3u:3094_0: asyāḥ sarvadharmavṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyāḥ yan nv ahaṃ puṣyāṇy abhinirmāya
S06sspp2_3u:3094_1: buddhaṃ bhagavataṃ bodhisattvāṃś ca mahāsattvān bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtisthaviram
S06sspp2_3u:3094_2: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe avakireyam abhyavakireyam abhiprākireyaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3095_0: yāvantaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau cāturmahārājikā devās trāyastriṃśā devā
S06sspp2_3u:3095_1: yāmā devās tuṣitā devāḥ nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmakāyikā
S06sspp2_3u:3095_2: devā brahmapurohitā devā brāhmaparṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā
S06sspp2_3u:3095_3: devā apramāṇābhā devāḥ ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parittaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā
S06sspp2_3u:3095_4: devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatpharā devā
S06sspp2_3u:3095_5: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devā sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devās teṣām etad abhūvan:
S06sspp2_3u:3096_0: asyā dharmavṛṣṭeḥ subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyamāṇāyāḥ. yaṃ nūnaṃ vayaṃ puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya
S06sspp2_3u:3096_1: buddhaṃ bhagavataṃ bodhisattvāṃś ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtisthavirañ cāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
S06sspp2_3u:3097_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro ye trisāhasramahāsāḥsre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06sspp2_3u:3097_1: devāḥ trāyastriṃśā devāḥ yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
S06sspp2_3u:3097_2: devā brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā
S06sspp2_3u:3097_3: ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhasvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā
S06sspp2_3u:3097_4: devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhākṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā
S06sspp2_3u:3097_5: devā bṛhatphalā devā abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā
S06sspp2_3u:3097_6: devās te sarve divyāni māndāravāni puṣpāṇy abhinirmāya buddhaṃ bhagavataṃ bodhisattvāṃś
S06sspp2_3u:3097_7: ca mahāsattvāṃś ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca suhūtisthaviram asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjākarmaṇe avikiranti sma,
S06sspp2_3u:3102: upariṣṭhād aṃtarīkṣe trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ pramāṇaḥ puṣpakūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt ramaṇīyo manoramaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3106: yānīmāni puṣpāṇi devair abhyavakīrṇāni nirmitānīmāni puṣpāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:3107: na staṃbhaniryātāni na sthalajāni na jalajāni yānīmāni puṣpāṇi devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni manomayānīmāni puṣpāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:3110: atha śakro devānām indraḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtisthaviram etad avocan:
S06sspp2_3u:3115: aniryātānīmāni puṣpāṇi nemāni puṣpāṇi manoniryātāni na stambhaniryātāni,
S06sspp2_3u:3117: śakra āha: kiṃ punar bhadanta subhūte,
S06sspp2_3u:3119: atha rūpam apy anirjātam evaṃ vedanāpy aniyātā saṃjñāpy aniryātā saṃskārā apy aniryātā vijñānam apy aniryātam.
S06sspp2_3u:3123: rūpam api kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3124: vedanāpi kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:3125: saṃjñāpi kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_3u:3126: saṃskārā api kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3127: vijñānam api kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_3u:3128: cakṣuḥ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3129: śrotraṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3130: ghrāṇaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3131: jihvā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_3u:3132: kāyaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3133: manaḥ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:3134: rūpaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3135: śabdaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3136: gandhaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3137: rasaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3138: sparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3139: dharmāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:3140: cakṣurvijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3141: śrotravijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3142: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3143: jihvāvijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3144: kāyavijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ, (ŚsP_II-3_59)
S06sspp2_3u:3145: manovijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_3u:3146: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3147: śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3148: ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3149: jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3150: kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na saḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3151: manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa tnanaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:3152: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:3153: śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:3154: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:3155: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:3156: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:3157: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā kauśikāniryātā yā caniryātā na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_3u:3158: pṛthivīdhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3159: abdhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na so 'bdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3160: tejodhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3161: vāyudhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3162: ākāśadhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3163: vijñānadhātuḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:3164: avidyā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā avidyā,
S06sspp2_3u:3165: saṃskārāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3166: vijñānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3167: nāmarūpaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3168: ṣaḍāyatanaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3169: sparśaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3170: vedanā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_3u:3171: tṛṣṇā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_3u:3172: upādānaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3173: bhavaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3174: jātiḥ kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3175: jarāmaraṇaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na taj jarāmaraṇam.
S06sspp2_3u:3176: dānapāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:3178: kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:3179: kṣāntipāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:3180: vīryapāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:3181: dhyānapāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:3182: prajñāpāramitā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:3183: adhyātmaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3184: bahirdhāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3185: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3186: śūnyatāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3187: mahāśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3188: paramārthaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3189: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3190: asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3191: atyantaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sātyantaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3192: anavarāgraśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sānavarāgraśūnyata,
S06sspp2_3u:3193: anavakāraśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3194: prakṛtiśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3195: sarvadharmaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3196: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3197: anupalambhaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sānupalambhaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3198: abhāvaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3199: svabhāvaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3200: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_3u:3201: smṛtyupasthānāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_3u:3202: samyakprahāṇāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_3u:3203: ṛddhipādāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3204: indriyāṇi kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tānīndriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_3u:3205: balāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_3u:3206: bodhyaṅgāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_3u:3207: āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3208: āryasatyāni kauśikāṃiryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_3u:3209: dhyānāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_3u:3210: apramāṇāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāny apramāṇāni,
S06sspp2_3u:3211: ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3214: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ kauśikāniryātā yāś cāniryātā na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3215: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_3u:3216: abhijñāḥ kauśikāniryātā yās cāniryātā na tā abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3217: samādhayaḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3218: dhāraṇīmukhāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_3u:3219: daśatathāgatabalāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni daśatathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_3u:3220: catvāri vaiśāradyāni kauśikāniryātāni yāni cāniryātāni na tāni catvāri vaiśāradyāṃi,
S06sspp2_3u:3221: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ kauśikāniryātā yāś cāniryātā na tāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3222: mahāmaitrī kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_3u:3223: mahākaruṇā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_3u:3224: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ kauśikāniryātā ye cāniryātā na te aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3225: srotaāpattiphalaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tac chrotaāpattiphalaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3226: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tat sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3227: anāgāmiphalaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad anāgāmiphalaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3228: arhattvaṃ kauśikāniryātaṃ yac cāniryātaṃ na tad arhattvaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3229: pratyekabodhiḥ kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā pratyekabodhiḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3230: mārgākārajñatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3231: sarvākārajñatā kauśikāniryātā yā cāniryātā na sā sarvākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_3u:3232: srotaāpannaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāo na sa srotaāpannaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3233: sakṛdāgāmī kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa sakṛdāgāmī,
S06sspp2_3u:3234: anāgāmī kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na so anāgāmī,
S06sspp2_3u:3235: arhat kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na so arhat,
S06sspp2_3u:3236: pratyekabuddhaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa pratyekabuddhaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3237: bodhisattvaḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:3238: tathāgataḥ kauśikāniryāto yaś cāniryāto na sa tathāgataḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:3239: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhūt:
S06sspp2_3u:3240: gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ subhūtisthaviro yatra hi nāma prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāñ copadiśati.
S06sspp2_3u:3241: atha bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate sma:
S06sspp2_3u:3242: evam etat kauśikaivam etad gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ yatra hi nāmaṃ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati.
S06sspp2_3u:3243: atha śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:3244: kathaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptiṃ ca na virodhayati dharmatāṃ copadiśati?
S06sspp2_3u:3246: evam ukte bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:3247: rūpaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3248: vedanā kauśika prajñaptimātrā yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3249: saṃjñā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3250: saṃskārāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3251: vijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3252: yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:3253: yā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
S06sspp2_3u:3254: cakṣuḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3255: śrotraṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3256: ghrāṇaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3257: jihvā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3258: kāyaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3259: manaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3260: yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:3261: yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
S06sspp2_3u:3262: rūpaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3263: śabdaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3264: gandhaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3265: rasaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3266: sparśaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3267: dharmāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3269: yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rūdhyate na virūdhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:3270: yā na rūdhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati (ŚsP_II-3_63)
S06sspp2_3u:3272: cakṣurvijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3273: śrotravijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3274: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3275: jihvāvijñānaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,

S06sspp2_3u:3361: dhyānāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3362: apramāṇāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3363: ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3365: prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3366: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3367: yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:3368: yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
S06sspp2_3u:3369: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3370: abhijñāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3371: samādhayaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3372: dhāraṇīmukhāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3373: daśatathāgatabalāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3374: catvāri vaiśāradyāni kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3375: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3376: mahāmaitrī kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3377: mahākaruṇā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3378: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3379: yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:3380: yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
S06sspp2_3u:3381: srotaāpattiphalaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3382: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3383: anāgāmiphalaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3384: anāgāmiphalaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3385: arhattvaṃ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3387: prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3388: mārgākārajñatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3389: sarvākārajñatā kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3391: yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:3392: yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati.
S06sspp2_3u:3393: srotaāpannaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3394: sakṛdāgāmī kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3395: anāgāmī kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3396: arhat kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3397: pratyekabuddhaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3398: bodhisattvaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3399: samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kauśika prajñaptimātraṃ yat prajñaptimātraṃ sā dharmatā tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'virodhenopadiśati,
S06sspp2_3u:3401: yā kauśika dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā na rudhyate na virudhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:3402: yā na rudhyate na virudhyate tāṃ subhūtiḥ sthavira upadiśati na ca virodhayati. evaṃ khalu kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñaptito na ca virodhayati.
S06sspp2_3u:3403: atha khalv āyuṣman subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:3405: tad yathā pi nāma bhagavatā prajñaptimātraṃ sarvadharmān upadiṣṭāḥ. evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñaptimātraṃ sarvadharmān viditvā prajñāpāramitāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06sspp2_3u:3406: evaṃ śikṣamānaḥ punaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3407: tathā hi sa rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. vedanāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3408: tathā hi sa vedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. saṃjñāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3409: tathā hi sa saṃjñāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. saṃskāreṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3410: tathā hi sa saṃskārān na samanuupaśyati yatra śikṣate. vijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3411: tathā hi sa vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati (ŚsP_II-3_69)
S06sspp2_3u:3413: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś cakṣuṣi na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3414: tathā hi sa cakṣur na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śrotre na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3415: tathā hi sa śrotraṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. ghrāṇe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3416: tathā hi sa ghrāṇaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. jihvāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3417: tathā hi sa jihvāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. kāye na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3418: tathā hi sa kāyaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. manasi na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3419: tathā hi sa mano na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:3421: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3422: tathā hi sa rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śabde na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3423: tathā hi sa śabdaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. gandhe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3424: tathā hi sa gandhaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. rase na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3425: tathā hi sa rasaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. sparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3426: tathā hi sa sparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. dharmeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3427: tathā hi sa dharmān na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:3428: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ cakṣurvijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3429: tathā hi sa cakṣurvijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śrotravijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3430: tathā hi sa śrotravijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. ghrāṇavijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3431: tathā hi sa ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. jihvāvijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3432: tathā hi sa jihvāvijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. kāyavijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3433: tathā hi sa kāyavijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. manovijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3434: tathā hi sa manovijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:3435: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3436: tathā hi sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śrotrasaṃsparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3437: tathā hi sa śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. ghrāṇasaṃsparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3438: tathā hi sa ghrāṇāsaṃsparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. jihvāsaṃsparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3440: jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. kāyasaṃsparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3441: tathā hi sa kāyasaṃsparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. manaḥsaṃsparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3442: tathā hi sa manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:3443: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3444: tathā hi sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyaya vedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3445: tathā hi sa śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3446: tathā hi sa ghrāṇāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ na śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:3448: tathā hi sa jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na samamupaśyati yatra śikṣate. kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3449: tathā hi sa kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3450: tathā hi sa manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:3451: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pṛthivīdhātau na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3452: tathā hi sa pṛthivīdhātuṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. abdhātau na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3453: tathā hi so 'bdhātuṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. tejodhātau na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3454: tathā hi sa tejodhātuṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. vāyudhātau na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3455: tathā hi sa vāyudhātuṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. ākāśadhātau na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3456: tathā hi sa ākāśadhātuṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. vijñānadhātau na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3457: tathā hi sa vijñānadhātuṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:3458: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vidyāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3459: tathā hi so 'vidyāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. saṃskāreṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3460: tathā hi sa saṃskārān na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. vijñāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3461: tathā hi sa vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. nāmarūpe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3462: tathā hi sa nāmarūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. ṣaḍāyatane na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3463: tathā hi sa ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. sparśe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3464: tathā hi sa sparśaṃ na samanupaśyati (ŚsP_II-3_71)
S06sspp2_3u:3465: yatra śikṣate. vedanāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3466: tathā hi sa vedanāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. tṛṣṇāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3467: yathā hi sa tṛṣṇāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. upādāne na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3468: tathā hi sa upādānaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. bhave na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3469: tathā hi sa bhavaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. jātau na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3470: tathā hi sa jātiṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. jarāmaraṇe na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3471: tathā hi sa jarāmaraṇaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:3472: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3473: tathā hi sa dānapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śīlapāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3474: tathā hi sa śīlapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3475: tathā hi sa kṣāntipāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. vīryapāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3476: tathā hi sa vīryapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3477: tathā hi sa dhyānapāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3478: tathā hi sa prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:3479: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3480: tathā hi so 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3481: tathā hi sa bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3482: tathā hi so 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3483: tathā hi sa śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. mahāśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3484: tathā hi sa mahāśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3485: tathā hi sa paramārthaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3486: tathā hi sa saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3487: tathā hi so 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. atyantaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3488: tathā hi so 'tyantaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3490: yatra śikṣate. anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3491: tathā hi so 'navakāraśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3492: tathā hi sa prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3493: tathā hi sa sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3494: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. anupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3495: tathā hi so 'nupalambhaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3496: tathā hi so 'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3497: tathā hi sa svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3498: tathā hi so 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:3499: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3500: tathā hi sa catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3501: tathā hi sa samyakprahāṇāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. caturṣu ṛddhipādeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3502: tathā hi sa ṛddhipādāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. pañcendriyeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3503: tathā hi sa indriyāṇi na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. pañcaṣu baleṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3504: tathā hi sa balāṇi na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3505: tathā hi sa bodhyaṅgāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. āryāṣṭāṅge marge na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3506: tathā hi sa āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:3507: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caturṣv āryasatyeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3508: tathā hi sa āryasatyāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. caturṣu dhyāneṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3509: tathā hi sa dhyānāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. caturṣv apramāṇeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3510: tathā hi sa apramāṇāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. catasṛṣu ārūpyasamāpattiṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3511: tathā hi sa ārūpyasamāpattin na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. aṣṭāṣu vimokṣeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3512: tathā hi so 'ṣṭau vimokṣān na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. (ŚsP_II-3_73)
S06sspp2_3u:3513: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3514: tathā hi so 'nupūrvavihārasamāpattīn na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukheṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3515: tathā hi sa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. pañcasv abhijñāsu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3516: tathā hi so 'bhijñā na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. sarvasamādhiṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3517: tathā hi sa sarvasamādhīn na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. dhāraṇīmukheṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3518: tathā hi sa dhāraṇīmukhāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. daśatathāgatabaleṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3519: tathā hi sa daśatathāgatabalāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3520: tathā hi sa vaiśāradyāni na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3521: tathā hi sa catasraḥ pratisaṃvido na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. mahāmaitryā na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3522: tathā hi sa mahāmaitrīn na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. mahākaruṇāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3523: tathā hi sa mahākaruṇāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3524: tathā hi so 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:3525: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ srotaāpattiphale na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3526: tathā hi sa srotaāpattiphalaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. sakṛdāgāmiphale na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3527: tathā hi sa sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. anāgāmiphale na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3528: tathā hi sa anāgāmiphalaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra sikṣate. arhattve na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3529: tathā hi so 'rhattvaṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. pratyekabodhau na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3530: tathā hi sa pratyekabodhiṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. mārgākārajñatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3531: tathā hi sa mārgākārajñatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate. sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na śikṣate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:3532: tathā hi sa sarvākārajñatāṃ na samanupaśyati yatra śikṣate.
S06sspp2_3u:3533: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:3534: kena kāraṇena bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:3632: kena kāraṇena catvāri vaiśāradyāni na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:3633: kena kāraṇena catasraḥ pratisaṃvido na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:3641: tathā hi kauśika rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06sspp2_3u:3744: na hi kauśika rūpaśūnyatā rūpaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_3u:3849: yaḥ kauśika iha śūnyatāyāṃ na śikṣate sa śūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate 'dvaidhīkāreṇa,

S06sspp2_3u:5142: evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmaparigrahayogena sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06sspp2_3u:5143: āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
S06sspp2_3u:5145: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati,
S06sspp2_3u:5147: āha: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ parigrahāyāntardhānāya śikṣitvā kathaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati?
S06sspp2_3u:5149: ihāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran na rūpasyotpādaṃ paśyati,

S06sspp2_3u:5152: tathā hi rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāve na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:5153_0: na vedanāyā utpādaṃ paśyati na nirodhaṃ paśyati nāgrahaṃ paśyati notsargaṃ paśyati

S06sspp2_3u:5153_2: paśyati na vṛddhiṃ paśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_3u:7160: na pratisaṃvittathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pratisaṃvittathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7161: na pratisaṃviddharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra pratisaṃviddharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7162: na mahāmaitrī prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahāmaitryāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7163: na mahāmaitrītathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahāmaitrītathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7164: na mahāmaitrīdharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahāmaitrīdharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7165: na mahākaruṇā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahākaruṇāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7166: na mahākaruṇātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahākaruṇātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7167: na mahākaruṇādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mahākaruṇādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7171: na sarvajñatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7172: na sarvajñatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvajñatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7173: na sarvajñatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvajñatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7174: na mārgākārajñatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mārgākārajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7175: na mārgākārajñatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mārgākārajñatātathatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7176: na mārgākārajñatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra mārgākārajñatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7177: na sarvākārajñatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7178: na sarvākārajñatātathatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatātathatāyaḥ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7179: na sarvākārajñatādharmatā prajñāpāramitā nānyatra sarvākārajñatādharmatāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:7180: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ sthaviraṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:7181: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7182: apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ bhadanta subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7184: subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7186: srotaāpannaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyate prāpsyate ca,
S06sspp2_3u:7187: sakṛdāgāmibhiḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyate prāpsyate ca,
S06sspp2_3u:7188: anāgāmibhir anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyate prāpsyate ca,
S06sspp2_3u:7189: arhadbhir arhattvaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyate prāpsyate ca,
S06sspp2_3u:7190: pratyekabuddhaiḥ pratyekabodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca,
S06sspp2_3u:7191: yatra śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ parisodhyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
S06sspp2_3u:7194: mahāpāramiteyaṃ kauśika bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7195: apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ kauśika bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7196: anantapāramiteyaṃ kauśika bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_3u:7197: yatra śikṣamāṇaiḥ srotaāpannaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyate prāpsyate ca,
S06sspp2_3u:7198: sakṛdāgāmibhiḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyate prāpsyate ca,
S06sspp2_3u:7199: anāgāmibhir anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyate prāpsyate ca,
S06sspp2_3u:7200: arhadbhir arhattvaṃ prāptaṃ prāpyate prāpsyate ca,
S06sspp2_3u:7201: pratyekabuddhaiḥ pratyekabodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca,
S06sspp2_3u:7202: yatra śikṣamāṇair bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ parisodhyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
S06sspp2_3u:7203: rūpamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7204: tathā hi kauśika rūpasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7206: vedanāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7207: tathā hi kauśika vedanāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7209: saṃjñāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7210: tathā hi kauśika saṃjñāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7212: saṃskāramahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7213: tathā hi kauśika saṃskārāṇāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7215: vijñānamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7219: cakṣurmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7220: tathā hi kauśika cakṣuṣo na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7222: śrotramahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7223: tathā hi kauśika śrotrasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7225: ghrāṇamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7226: tathā hi kauśika ghrāṇasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7228: jihvāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7229: tathā hi kauśika jihvāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7231: kāyamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7232: tathā hi kauśika kāyasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7234: manomahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7235: tathā hi kauśika manaso na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7237: rūpamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7238: tathā hi kauśika rūpasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7240: śabdamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7241: tathā hi kauśika śabdasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7243: gandhamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7244: tathā hi kauśika gandhasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7246: rasamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7247: tathā hi kauśika rasasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7249: sparśamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7250: tathā hi kauśika sparśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7252: dharmamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7253: tathā hi kauśika dharmāṇāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate, (ŚsP_II-3_180)
S06sspp2_3u:7255: cakṣurvijñānamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7256: tathā hi kauśika cakṣurvijñānasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7258: śrotravijñānamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7259: tathā hi kauśika śrotravijñānasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7261: ghrāṇavijñānamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7262: tathā hi kauśika ghrāṇavijñānasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7264: jihvāvijñānamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7265: tathā hi kauśika jihvāvijñānasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7267: kāyavijñānamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7268: tathā hi kauśika kāyavijñānasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7270: manovijñānamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7271: tathā hi kauśika manovijñānasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7273: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7274: tathā hi kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7276: śrotrasaṃsparśamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7277: tathā hi kauśika śrotrasaṃsparśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7279: ghrāṇasaṃsparśamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7280: tathā hi kauśika ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7282: jihvāsaṃsparśamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7283: tathā hi kauśika jihvāsaṃsparśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7285: kāyasaṃsparśamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7286: tathā hi kauśika kāyasaṃsparśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7289: manaḥsaṃsparśamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7290: tathā hi kauśika manaḥsaṃsparśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7292: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7293: tathā hi kauśika cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7295: śrotrasarnsparśapratyayavedanāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7296: tathā hi kauśika śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7298: ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7299: tathā hi kauśika ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7301: jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7302: tathā hi kauśika jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7304: kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7305: tathā hi kauśika kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7307: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7308: tathā hi kauśika manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7310: pṛthivīdhātumahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7311: tathā hi kauśika pṛthivīdhātor na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7313: abdhātumahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7314: tathā hi kauśikābdhātor na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7316: tejodhātumahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7317: tathā hi kauśika tejodhātor na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7321: tathā hi kauśika vāyudhātor na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7323: ākāśadhātumahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7324: tathā hi kauśikākāśadhātor na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7326: vijñānadhātumahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7327: tathā hi kauśika vijñānadhātor na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7329: avidyāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7330: tathā hi kauśikavidyāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7332: saṃskāramahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7333: tathā hi kauśika saṃskārāṇāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7335: vijñānamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7336: tathā hi kauśika vijñānasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7338: nāmarūpamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7339: tathā hi kauśika nāmarūpasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7341: ṣaḍāyatanamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7342: tathā hi kauśika ṣaḍāyatanasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7344: sparśamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7345: tathā hi kauśika sparśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7347: vedanāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7348: tathā hi kauśika vedanāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7350: tṛṣṇāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7351: tathā hi kauśika tṛṣṇāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7353: upādānamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7354: tathā hi kauśikopādānasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7358: tathā hi kauśika bhvasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7360: jātimahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7361: tathā hi kauśika jāter na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7363: jarāmaraṇamahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7364: tathā hi kauśika jarāmaraṇasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7366: dānapāramitāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7367: tathā hi kauśika dānapāramitāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7369: śīlapāramitāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:7370: tathā hi kauśika śīlapāramitāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:7372: kṣāntipāramitāmahadgatatayā kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_3u:8250: anupūrvavihārasamāpattyanantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8251: tathā hi kauśikānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ nānto na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:8252: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānantatayā kauśikāpramāṇapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8253: tathā hi kauśika śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ nānto na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:8254: abhijñānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8256: tad yathāpi nama kauśikākāśasya nānto na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:8257: samādhyanantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8258: tathā hi kauśika samādhīnāṃ nānto na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:8259: dhāraṇīmukhānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8260: tathā hi kauśika dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ nānto na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:8261: tathāgatabalānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8262: tathā hi kauśika tathāgatabalānāṃ nānto na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:8263: vaiśāradyānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8264: tathā hi kauśika vaiśāradyānāṃ nānto na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:8266: kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8267: tathā hi kauśika pratisaṃvidāṃ nānto na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:8268: mahāmaitryanantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_3u:8274: sarvajñatānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8275: tathā hi kauśika sarvajñatāyā nānto na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:8276: mārgākārajñatānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8277: tathā hi kauśika mārgākārajñatāyā nānto na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_3u:8278: sarvākārajñatānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8279: tathā hi kauśika sarvākārajñatāyā nānto na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_3u:8280: anena kauśika paryāyeṇānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:8391: punar aparaṃ kauśikālambanānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:8392: śakra āha: yathā kathaṃ punar bhadanta subhūte ālambanānantatayānantatapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
S06sspp2_3u:8394: sarvākārajñatālambanānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:8395: punar aparaṃ kauśika dharmālambanānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:8396: śakra āha: yathā kathaṃ punar bhadanta subhūte dharmālambanānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
S06sspp2_3u:8398: dharmadhātvanantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:8399: punar aparaṃ kauśika tathatālambanānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:8400: śakra āha: yathā kathaṃ punar bhadanta subhūte tathatālambanānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
S06sspp2_3u:8402_1: tathatālambanānantatayā kauśikānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_3u:8403: punar aparaṃ kauśika sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām.
S06sspp2_3u:8404: śakra āha: yathā kathaṃ punar bhadanata subhūte sattvānantatayānantapāramiteyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā?
S06sspp2_3u:8409_0: śakra āha: nedaṃ bhadanta subhūte dharmādhivacanaṃ nādharmādhivacanam āgantukam etan
S06sspp2_3u:8409_1: nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptam avastukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptam anārambaṇam etan nāmadheyaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:8409_2: prakṣiptaṃ yad uta sattvaḥ sattva iti.
S06sspp2_3u:8412: kauśika kācid iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā.
S06sspp2_3u:8413: śakra aha: no hīdaṃ bhadanta subhūte.
S06sspp2_3u:8415_0: yatra kauśika na sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā kācit tatra sattvānantatā sacet kauśika tathāgato
S06sspp2_3u:8415_1: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān tiṣṭha ca sattvaḥ sattva iti vācaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06sspp2_3u:8417: kauśikāpi nu tatra kaścit sattva utpadyate vā niruddhyate vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8418: śakra āha: no hīdaṃ bhadanta subhūte. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8421: tad anena te kauśika paryāyeṇa sattvānantatyā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_3u:8422: atha sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakā devāḥ saprajñāpatikā devāḥ sanārīnaragaṇās triskṛtvā udānam udānayati sma,
S06sspp2_3u:8423_0: aho svākhyāto dharmaḥ aho svākhyāto dharmā aho svākhyāto dharmasya dharmatā yeyaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:8423_1: subhūtinā sthavireṇa bhāṣyate yad uta tathāgataprādurbhāvo ya tathāgatasyādhiṣṭhānena
S06sspp2_3u:8424: api nu tathāgatam eva vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dhārayiṣyāmaḥ. yo na yā prajñāpāramitayā avirahitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8425: na ca nāma kaścid dharma upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_3u:8426: rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8427: cakṣur vā śrotraṃ vā ghrāṇaṃ vā jihvā vā kāyo vā mano vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8428: rūpaṃ vā śabdo vā gandho vā raso vā sparśo vā dharmā vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8436_0: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo vā śrotrasaṃsparśo vā ghrāṇasaṃsparśo vā jihvāsaṃsparśo vā kāyasaṃsparśo
S06sspp2_3u:8436_1: vā manaḥsaṃsparśo vā. cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā vā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
S06sspp2_3u:8436_2: vā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā vā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā vā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
S06sspp2_3u:8437: pṛthivīdhātur vā abdhātur vā tejodhātur vā vāyudhātur vā ākāśadhātur vā vijñānadhātur vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8438: avidyā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā nāmarūpaṃ vā ṣaḍāyatanaṃ vā sparśo vā vedanā vā tṛṣṇā vā upādānaṃ vā bhavo vā jātir vā jarāmaraṇaṃ vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8439: dānapāramitā vā śīlapāramitā vā kṣāntipāramitā vā vīryapāramitā vā dhyānapāramitā vā prajñāpāramitā vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8440_0: adhyātmasūnyatā vā bahirdhāśūnyatā vā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā vā śūnyatāśūnyatā vā
S06sspp2_3u:8440_1: mahāśūnyatā vā paramārthaśūnyatā vā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā vā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā vā atyantaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_3u:8440_2: vā anavarāgraśūnyatā vā anavakāraśūnyatā vā prakṛtiśūnyatā vā sarvadharmaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_3u:8440_3: vā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā vā anupalambhaśūnyatā vā abhāvaśūnyatā vā svabhāvaśūnyatā vā
S06sspp2_3u:8441_0: smṛtyupasthānāni vā samyakprahāṇāni vā ṛddhipādā vā indriyāṇi vā balāni vā bodhyaṅgāni
S06sspp2_3u:8441_1: vā āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo vā āryasatyāni vā dhyānāni vā apramāṇāni vā ārūpyasamāpattayo
S06sspp2_3u:8441_2: vā aṣṭau vimokṣā vā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayo vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni
S06sspp2_3u:8441_3: vā abhijñā vā samādhayo vā dhāraṇīmukhāni vā tathāgatabalāni vā vaiśāradyāni vā pratisaṃvido
S06sspp2_3u:8441_4: vā mahāmaitrī vā mahākaruṇā vā āveṇikabuddhadharmā vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:8441_5: vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir vā mārgākārajñatā vā sarvākārajñatā
S06sspp2_3u:8441_6: vā. trayāṇāṃ ca yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ prajñāyate. katameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ?
S06sspp2_3u:8443: atha bhagavāṃs tān sendrakān devaputrān āmantrayate,
S06sspp2_3u:8444: evam etat tathā yathā vācaṃ bhāṣadhve na ca nāma kaścid dharma upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_3u:8445: rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8446: cakṣur vā śrotraṃ vā ghrāṇaṃ vā jihvā vā kāyo vā mano vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8447: rūpaṃ vā śabdo vā gandho vā raso vā sparśo vā dharmā vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8454: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo vā śrotrasaṃsparśo vā ghrāṇasaṃsparśo vā jihvāsaṃsparśo (ŚsP_II-3_217)
S06sspp2_3u:8456_1: vā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā vā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā vā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8457: pṛthivīdhātur vā abdhātur vā tejodhātur vā vāyudhātur vā ākāśadhātur vā vijñānadhātur vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8458: avidyā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā nāmarūpaṃ vā ṣaḍāyatanaṃ vā sparśo vā vedanā vā tṛṣṇā vā upādānaṃ vā bhavo vā jātir vā jarāmaraṇaṃ vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8459: dānapāramitā vā śīlapāramitā vā kṣāntipāramitā vā vīryapāramitā vā dhyānapāramitā vā prajñāpāramitā vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8460_0: adhyātmaśūnyatā vā bahirdhāśūnyatā vā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā vā śūnyatāśūnyatā vā
S06sspp2_3u:8460_1: mahāśūnyatā vā paramārthaśūnyatā vā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā vā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā vā atyantaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_3u:8460_2: vā anavarāgraśūnyatā vā anavakāraśūnyatā vā prakṛtiśūnyatā vā sarvadharmaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_3u:8460_3: vā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā vā anupalambhaśūnyatā vā abhāvaśūnyatā vā svabhāvaśūnyatā vā
S06sspp2_3u:8461_0: smṛtyupasthānāni vā samyakprahāṇāni vā ṛddhipādā vā indriyāṇi vā balāni vā bodhyaṅgāni
S06sspp2_3u:8461_1: vā āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo vā āryasatyāni vā dhyānāni vā apramāṇāni vā ārūpyasamāpattayo
S06sspp2_3u:8461_2: vā aṣṭau vimokṣā vā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayo vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni
S06sspp2_3u:8461_3: vā abhijñā vā samādhayo vā dhāraṇīmukhāni vā tathāgatabalāni vā vaiśāradyāni vā pratisaṃvido
S06sspp2_3u:8461_4: vā mahāmaitrī vā mahākaruṇā vā āveṇikabuddhadharmā vā srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdagāmiphalaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:8461_5: vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhir vā mārgākārajñatā vā sarvākārajñatā vā.
S06sspp2_3u:8462: trayāṇāṃ ca yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ prajñāyate. katameṣaṃ trayāṇām?
S06sspp2_3u:8464: tathāgata eva sadevaputrā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhārayitavyaḥ.
S06sspp2_3u:8465: yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhaviṣyaty anupalambhayogena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8466: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni. katamāṇi trīṇi?
S06sspp2_3u:8520: bodhisattvāś ca devaputrā mahāsattvāḥ sarvatrātra dharmeṣu śikṣate,
S06sspp2_3u:8575: tasmāt tarhi devaputrās tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vaktavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:8577: yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyānike padmāvatyāṃ rājadhānyām antarāpaṇamadhyagato dānapāramitayā avirahito 'bhūvan,
S06sspp2_3u:8624_0: anyair anyaiś cāparimāṇair buddhadharmair avirahito 'bhūvan tac cānupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_3u:8624_1: tadāhaṃ devaputrās tena dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛtānuttarāṃ
S06sspp2_3u:8625_0: asminn eva lokadhātāv asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S06sspp2_3u:8625_1: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ sāstā devānāṃ ca
S06sspp2_3u:8627: āścarya bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvākārajñatāyā anuparigrāhikā,
S06sspp2_3u:8734_0: atha bhagavāṃś catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikān bodhisattvān mahāsattvāṃś
S06sspp2_3u:8734_1: cāturmahārājakāyikāṃś ca devaputrāṃ trāyastriṃśāṃś ca devaputrān upamāṃś ca devaputrāṃs
S06sspp2_3u:8734_2: tuṣitāṃś ca devaputrān nirmāṇaratiś ca devaputrāś ca devaputrān paranirmitavaśavartiś
S06sspp2_3u:8734_3: ca devaputrā brahmakāyikāś ca devaputrā brahmapurohitāṃś ca devaputrān brahmapārṣadyāś
S06sspp2_3u:8734_4: ca devaputrān mahābrahmāṇaś ca devaputrān ābhāś ca devaputrān parīttābhāṃś ca devaputrān
S06sspp2_3u:8734_5: apramāṇābhāṃś ca devān ābhāsvarāṃś ca devān śubhāṃś ca devān parīttaśubhāṃś ca devān
S06sspp2_3u:8734_6: pramāṇaśubhāṃś ca devān śubhakṛtṣṇāṃś ca devān bṛhāś ca devān parīttabṛhāś ca devān
S06sspp2_3u:8734_7: pramāṇabṛhāṃś ca devān bṛhatphalāṃś ca devān avṛhāś ca devān atapāṃś ca devān sadṛśāś
S06sspp2_3u:8734_8: ca devān sudarśanāṃś ca devān akaniṣṭhāṃś ca devān saṃnipatitāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇāṃ viditvā
S06sspp2_3u:8734_9: tān sarvāṃ sākṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā śakradevānām indram āmantrayate sma.
S06sspp2_3u:8735_0: ye kecit kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopasikāḥ kulaputrāḥ
S06sspp2_3u:8735_1: kuladuhitaro vā devaputrā devakanyā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06sspp2_3u:8735_2: paryavāpsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_3u:8736: sarvākārajñatācittena cāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti. na teṣāṃ mārapāpīyāṃ mārakāyikā devatā avatāraṃ lapsyate.
S06sspp2_3u:8738: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca rūpaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8742: vijñānaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8743: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8746: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā cakṣuḥśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8751: manaḥśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8752: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8755: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā rūpaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā (ŚsP_II-3_224)
S06sspp2_3u:8761: dharmaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8762: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8765: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā cakṣurvijñānasūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8770: manovijñānaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8771: tathā hi na sūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8774: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8779: manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8780: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8783: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8790: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8793: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā pṛthivīdhātuśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8798: vijñānadhātuśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8803: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vāvidyāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8816: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8819: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā dānapāramitāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8826: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8829: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā adhyātmaśūnyatāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8846: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8847: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8850: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā smṛtyupasthānaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8858: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8861: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vāryasatyaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8870: dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8871: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8874: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā tathāgatabalaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8879: āveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8880: tathā hi na śūnyatā śūnyatāyā avatāraṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_3u:8883: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā sarvajñatāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_3u:8885: sarvākārajñatāśūnyataiva svadhiṣṭhitā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8886: tathā hi teṣāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
S06sspp2_3u:8890: na khalu punaḥ kauśika teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ manusyā vāmanuṣyā vāvatāraṃ prekṣāvatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8891: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā sarvasattvānām antike (ŚsP_II-3_227)
S06sspp2_3u:8892: maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāsu bhāvitā tac cānupalambhayogena. na ca sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitaro vā viṣamā parihāreṇa kālaṃ bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_3u:8894: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā dānapāramitāyāṃ caradbhiḥ sarvasattvā samyakparihāreṇa nopasthitā yo vā kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau,
S06sspp2_3u:8895_0: cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ trāyastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo
S06sspp2_3u:8895_1: devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ brahmakāyikā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā brahmapurohitā
S06sspp2_3u:8895_2: devā mahābrahmā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devā anuttarāyai
S06sspp2_3u:8896_0: yaiś ca devaputrair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na srutā nodgṛhītā na dhāritā paryavāptā
S06sspp2_3u:8896_1: tair devaputrair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā paryavāptavyā
S06sspp2_3u:8897_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika ye kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyanti
S06sspp2_3u:8897_1: dhārayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yonisaś ca manasikariṣyanti sarvākārajñatācittena cāvirahito bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_3u:8898: na khalu punas teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca śūnyāgāragatānāṃ vābhyavakāśagatānāṃ cotpathagatānāṃ vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ vā bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8899: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cādhyātmaśūnyatāsu bhāvitā tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_3u:8918_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau cāturmahārājakāyikā
S06sspp2_3u:8918_1: devā trāyastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
S06sspp2_3u:8918_2: devā brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā
S06sspp2_3u:8918_3: devās te sarve bhagavantam etad avocan:
S06sspp2_3u:8919_0: vayaṃ bhagavan teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ
S06sspp2_3u:8919_1: saṃvidhāsyāmo ya imāṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣante udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
S06sspp2_3u:8921: avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyanti sarvākārajñatā manasikāreṇa. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_3u:8922: bodhisattvaṃ hi bhagavan mahāsattvam āgamya narakā ucchidyante,
S06sspp2_3u:8923: yamaloka ucchidyante devadāridyam ucchidyante manuṣyadāridyam ucchidyante,
S06sspp2_3u:8925: na bhavanti durbhikṣakāntārāḥ sarva ucchidyante bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06sspp2_3u:9022: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvaḥ paripākaḥ prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_3u:9029: anena ca bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhyatavyā.
S06sspp2_3u:9030: evam ukte bhagavāṃc chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_3u:9032: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06sspp2_3u:9130: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sattvaḥ paripākaḥ prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_3u:9137: tasmād bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyāḥ pūjayitavyāḥ,
S06sspp2_3u:9139: mānsa kauśika satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ mānayitavyaṃ manyate,
S06sspp2_3u:9140: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartavyaṃ gurukartavyaṃ mānayitavyaṃ pūjayitavyaṃ manyet.
S06sspp2_3u:9141: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayītavyaḥ satatasamitaṃ cāsya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiḥ saṃvidhātavyā,
S06sspp2_3u:9143_0: lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇe bhavec chrāvakapratyekabuddhais tad yathā pi nāma naḍavanaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:9143_1: vā ikṣvanaṃ vā śaravanaṃ vā śāravanaṃ vā śārivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā tan kaścid eva
S06sspp2_3u:9143_2: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yavajjīvaṃ satkuryāt mānayet pūjayet sarvopakaraṇair yaś
S06sspp2_3u:9143_3: caikaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prathamacittotpādikaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir avirahitaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:9143_4: satkuryād gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayed ayam ayam eva tato bahutato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
S06sspp2_3u:9144: na khalu punaḥ kauśika tāṃc chrāvakapratyekabuddhān āgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo loke prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_3u:9146: bodhisattvaṃ punaḥ kauśika mahāsattvam āgamya sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddho loke prajñāyate,
S06sspp2_3u:9147_0: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyate. tasmāt tarhi kauśika sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
S06sspp2_3u:9147_1: lokena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ
